title: QA
description:
As part of the QA team in an Xtreme Programming (XP) environment, my primary goal is to promote quality from the initial stages of user story planning to production deployment.

Key responsibilities include:
- Driving quality from the start by ensuring processes align with high-quality standards.
- Engaging in continuous pair programming with developers.
- Building an automated testing platform using Playwright and Cucumber, integrated with Jira through Xray.

I am committed to technical excellence and innovation in QA.

title: QA Engineer
description: Contributed to software quality assurance and automation testing in Agile development environments.

title: QA Automation Engineer
description: Focused on automated testing, black-box testing, and mobile testing for gaming applications.

title: Quality Assurance
description: Worked on API testing, mobile testing, and quality assurance automation.

title: Software Engineer In Test
description: Developed automated testing frameworks and enhanced testing strategies for Glovo's platform.
